definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="damage" type="Number">damage</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Global trigger should be "Before entity is hurt"</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_isday"/></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="is_equipped"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:AssassinsGlory</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">LivingHurtEvent event2 = (LivingHurtEvent) event;</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:damage</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">event2.setAmount((float) damage);</field></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
